# California Salon & Barbershop Establishment License (2026)

## Establishment License Requirements

Any location where cosmetology or barbering services are performed for compensation must have an establishment license from the Board of Barbering and Cosmetology.

### Who Needs One?
- Hair salons
- Barber shops
- Nail salons
- Day spas
- Esthetician studios
- Mobile units (special requirements)

### Application Requirements
- Complete establishment application
- Floor plan showing:
  - Work stations
  - Shampoo areas
  - Waiting areas
  - Restrooms
  - Storage areas
- Proof of business entity (DBA, LLC, Corp)
- Building permit or occupancy certificate

### Fees (2025-2026)
| Fee Type | Amount |
|----------|--------|
| Establishment Application | $50 |
| Biennial Renewal | $40 |
| Delinquent Renewal | +$20 |
| Mobile Unit Inspection | $100 (additional) |

### Mobile Unit Requirements
- Separate mobile unit license
- Must pass inspection
- Hot and cold running water required
- Proper ventilation
- Meets all sanitation requirements

### Health & Safety Compliance
- Sanitation requirements (16 CCR ยง 980)
- Proper disposal of sharps and waste
- Disinfection protocols
- Cal/OSHA workplace safety
- Local health department permits may also be required

### Official URL
https://www.barbercosmo.ca.gov/applicants/
